wordageddon.dao

Interface AnswerDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AnswerDAOSQLite

    public interface AnswerDAO
    AnswerDAO interface for managing answer data in the database. Provides basic CRUD operations for Answer entities.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAnswer(int sessionId, java.lang.String questionText, java.lang.String chosenAnswer, java.lang.String correctAnswer, boolean isCorrect)
      Adds a new answer to the database.
      void deleteAnswersBySession(int sessionId)
      Deletes all answers for a specific game session.
      java.util.List<Answer> getAnswersBySession(int sessionId)
      Retrieves all answers for a specific game session.

    • Method Detail

      • addAnswer

        void addAnswer(int sessionId,
               java.lang.String questionText,
               java.lang.String chosenAnswer,
               java.lang.String correctAnswer,
               boolean isCorrect)
        Adds a new answer to the database.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the ID of the game session
        questionText - the text of the question
        chosenAnswer - the answer chosen by the user
        correctAnswer - the correct answer
        isCorrect - whether the answer is correct

      • getAnswersBySession

        java.util.List<Answer> getAnswersBySession(int sessionId)
        Retrieves all answers for a specific game session.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the ID of the game session
        Returns:
        a list of answers for the session

      • deleteAnswersBySession

        void deleteAnswersBySession(int sessionId)
        Deletes all answers for a specific game session.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the ID of the game session
